remarks: Cancellation law for scalar multiplication.  ( ~ hvmulcan analog.) (Contributed by NM, 2-Jul-2014.)
statement:
lvecmulcan.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lvecmulcan.s $e |- .x. = ( .s ` W ) $.
lvecmulcan.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
lvecmulcan.k $e |- K = ( Base ` F ) $.
lvecmulcan.o $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` F ) $.
lvecmulcan.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LVec ) $.
lvecmulcan.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. K ) $.
lvecmulcan.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.
lvecmulcan.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. V ) $.
lvecmulcan.n $e |- ( ph -> A =/= .0. ) $.
lvecvscan $p |- ( ph -> ( ( A .x. X ) = ( A .x. Y ) <-> X = Y ) ) $.
